General.Name: Gielda Praw Majatkowych Vindexus S.A.
General.Description: Gielda Praw Majatkowych Vindexus Spolka Akcyjna provides debt management services in Poland. It offers securitization funds; and debt collection and trading services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
General.Address: ul. Serock 3 lok. B2, Warsaw, Poland, 04-333
